Top Slider.description_0: Filo is here to help you find everything matters.
Top Slider.description_1: You will not waste time looking for your keys anymore.
Top Slider.description_2: Drop it in your purse or put it in your wallet and do not forget anything anymore.

Filo_Description.description: Filo is a small device that helps you to never forget or lose what matters most to you, with a simple app on your phone.

Bottom Slider.description_0: Insert Filo into your wallet and use the Filo app to locate it by making it ring or check where you last left it behind on the map.
Bottom Slider.description_1: Simply press twice the button on Filo and your smartphone will ring, even when itâ€™s in silent mode.
Bottom Slider.description_2: Attach Filo to your keys and pair it with the Filo app on your phone. Now you can easily ring your keys and find them fast.
Bottom Slider.description_3: Attach Filo to your keys and pair it with the Filo app on your phone. Now you can easily ring your keys and find them fast.
